metadata.title: CVE-2024-29131 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in Apache Commons Configuration.Thisissue affects Apache Commons Configuration: from 2.0 before 2.10.1. Usersare recommended to upgrade to version 2.10.1, which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: commons-configuration2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
